            module Cache
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              class RedisCache
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                include CachePort

                # Class-level connection pool cache
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                class_attribute :connection_pool_cache, default: {}
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Default expiration time of 1 hour if not specified
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                DEFAULT_TTL = 3600
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13.

                # Redis connection management
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                def self.redis
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  @redis ||= Redis.new(
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    url: ENV.fetch("REDIS_URL", "redis://localhost:6379/0"),
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    reconnect_attempts: 3
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  )
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                # Helper method to execute a block with a Redis connection
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                def self.with_redis(purpose = :default, &)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  if defined?(ConnectionPool) && block_given?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    connection_pool_for(purpose).with(&)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  else
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    yield redis
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Configure ConnectionPool size and timeout from ENV
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                def self.connection_pool_size
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  ENV.fetch("REDIS_POOL_SIZE", 10).to_i
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                def self.connection_pool_timeout
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  ENV.fetch("REDIS_POOL_TIMEOUT", 5).to_i

      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

                # Return the URL for a Redis DB for a given purpose
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                def self.url_for(purpose = :default)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  case purpose.to_sym
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  when :cache then ENV.fetch("REDIS_CACHE_URL") { ENV.fetch("REDIS_URL", "redis://localhost:6379/0") }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  when :queue then ENV.fetch("REDIS_QUEUE_URL") { ENV.fetch("REDIS_URL", "redis://localhost:6379/0") }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  when :throttling then ENV.fetch("REDIS_THROTTLING_URL") { ENV.fetch("REDIS_URL", "redis://localhost:6379/0") }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  else ENV.fetch("REDIS_URL", "redis://localhost:6379/0")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Build a new connection pool
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                def self.build_connection_pool(purpose)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  require "connection_pool" unless defined?(ConnectionPool)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  ConnectionPool.new(size: connection_pool_size, timeout: connection_pool_timeout) do
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    client = Redis.new(
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                      url: url_for(purpose),
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      timeout: ENV.fetch("REDIS_TIMEOUT", 5).to_i,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      reconnect_attempts: ENV.fetch("REDIS_RECONNECT_ATTEMPTS", 3).to_i
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    )
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    # Run a quick test to ensure the connection works in development
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    if Rails.env.development?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        client.ping
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info("Redis connection successful: #{url_for(purpose)}")
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.error("Redis connection failed: #{e.message}")
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    client
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                # Find or build a connection pool
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                def self.find_or_build_connection_pool(purpose)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  connection_pool_cache[purpose] ||= build_connection_pool(purpose)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                # Return a memoized ConnectionPool instance for a given purpose
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                def self.connection_pool_for(purpose = :default)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  case purpose.to_sym
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  when :cache then find_or_build_connection_pool(:cache)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  when :queue then find_or_build_connection_pool(:queue)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  when :throttling then find_or_build_connection_pool(:throttling)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  else find_or_build_connection_pool(:default)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                # Initialize Rails cache if using Redis Cache Store
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                def self.initialize_rails_cache!
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  cache_store_config = Rails.application.config.cache_store
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  if (cache_store_config.is_a?(Array) && cache_store_config[0] == :redis_cache_store) ||
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                     cache_store_config == :redis_cache_store
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    Rails.application.config.cache_store = [
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      :redis_cache_store,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      {
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                        url: url_for(:cache),
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                        pool: connection_pool_for(:cache),
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                        error_handler: lambda { |method:, returning:, exception:|
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.error("Redis Cache Error: #{exception.message}")
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                          Raven.capture_exception(exception) if defined?(Raven)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                        }
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      }
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    ]
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                # For backward compatibility
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                def self.redis_pool
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  if defined?(REDIS_POOL)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    REDIS_POOL
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  else
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    connection_pool_for(:default)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # Write a value to the cache
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # @param key [String] The cache key
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                # @param value [Object] The value to cache (will be JSON serialized)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                # @param ttl [Integer] Time to live in seconds
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] true if successful
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                def write(key, value, ttl: DEFAULT_TTL)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  self.class.with_redis(:cache) do |redis|
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    redis.setex(normalized_key(key), ttl, ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(value))
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  end
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  true
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Redis cache write error: #{e.message}")
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  false
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                # Read a value from the cache
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                # @param key [String] The cache key
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                # @return [Object, nil] The cached value or nil if not found/expired
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                def read(key)
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  data = self.class.with_redis(:cache) do |redis|
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    redis.get(normalized_key(key))
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  return nil if data.nil?
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  ActiveSupport::JSON.decode(data)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Redis cache read error: #{e.message}")
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Cache deserialization error: #{e.message}")
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                # Check if a key exists in the cache
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                # @param key [String] The cache key
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] true if the key exists
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                def exist?(key)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  self.class.with_redis(:cache) do |redis|
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    redis.exists?(normalized_key(key))
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Redis cache exist? error: #{e.message}")
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  false
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                # Delete a key from the cache
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # @param key [String] The cache key
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] true if successful
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                def delete(key)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  self.class.with_redis(:cache) do |redis|
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    redis.del(normalized_key(key))
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  true
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Redis cache delete error: #{e.message}")
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  false
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                # Clear all keys matching a pattern
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # @param pattern [String] Pattern to match (e.g., "user:*")
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] true if successful
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                def clear(pattern = "*")
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  self.class.with_redis(:cache) do |redis|
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    keys = redis.keys(normalized_key(pattern))
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                    redis.del(*keys) unless keys.empty?
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  true
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                rescue Redis::BaseError => e
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Redis cache clear error: #{e.message}")
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  false
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                def cache_metric(metric)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  # Ensure metric has an ID
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  if metric.id.nil?
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("Cannot cache metric without ID: #{metric.name}")
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    return metric
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  self.class.with_redis do |redis|
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    # Store the latest value for this metric name
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    redis.set(
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                      "metric:latest:#{metric.name}",
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      metric.value
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    )
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    # Store with dimensions as a hash if dimensions exist
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    if metric.dimensions.any?
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                      # Create a key that includes the dimensions
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                      dimension_string = metric.dimensions.sort.map { |k, v| "#{k}=#{v}" }.join(",")
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      redis.set(
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                        "metric:latest:#{metric.name}:#{dimension_string}",
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                        metric.value
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      )
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    # Add to a time-series sorted set with timestamp as score
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    # This allows for sliding window queries and expiration
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    timestamp = metric.timestamp.to_i
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    redis.zadd(
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                      "metric:timeseries:#{metric.name}",
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                      timestamp,
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                      "#{timestamp}:#{metric.value}"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    )
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    # Keep only the last 1000 values (or adjust as needed)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    redis.zremrangebyrank(
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                      "metric:timeseries:#{metric.name}",
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                      0,
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                      -1001
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                    )
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                    # Set default expiration for all metrics (30 days)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                    [
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                      "metric:latest:#{metric.name}",
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                      "metric:timeseries:#{metric.name}"
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                    ].each do |key|
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                      redis.expire(key, 30 * 24 * 60 * 60) # 30 days in seconds
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                    end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug { "Cached metric: #{metric.id} (#{metric.name})" }
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  metric
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                def get_cached_metric(name, dimensions = {})
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  self.class.with_redis do |redis|
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    # If dimensions are provided, try to fetch the specific metric
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                    if dimensions.any?
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                      dimension_string = dimensions.sort.map { |k, v| "#{k}=#{v}" }.join(",")
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                      dimension_key = "metric:latest:#{name}:#{dimension_string}"
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                      # Only return the value if this specific dimension combination exists
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                      if redis.exists?(dimension_key)
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                        value = redis.get(dimension_key)
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                        return value ? value.to_f : nil
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                      end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                      # If the specific dimension doesn't exist, return nil instead of falling back
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                      return nil
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                    end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                    # Fallback to the general metric name
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    value = redis.get("metric:latest:#{name}")
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                    value ? value.to_f : nil
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

            
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                def get_metric_history(name, limit = 100)
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  self.class.with_redis do |redis|
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    # Fetch the most recent metrics from the time series
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                    redis.zrevrange(
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                      "metric:timeseries:#{name}",
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                      0,
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                      limit - 1
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                    ).map do |entry|
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                      timestamp, value = entry.split(":")
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                      {
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                        timestamp: Time.at(timestamp.to_i),
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                        value: value.to_f
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                      }
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                    end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                  end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                def clear_metric_cache(name = nil)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  self.class.with_redis do |redis|
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                    if name
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                      # Clear specific metric cache
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                      pattern = "metric:*:#{name}*"
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                      redis.scan_each(match: pattern) do |key|
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                        redis.del(key)
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                      end
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                    else
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                      # Clear all metrics cache
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                      pattern = "metric:*"
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                      redis.scan_each(match: pattern) do |key|
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                        redis.del(key)
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                      end
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                    end
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  end
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                  true
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                end
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

            
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                # Needed for the QueuePort adapter to access Redis
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                delegate :redis, to: :class
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

            
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                private
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

            
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                # Normalize keys to include a namespace
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                def normalized_key(key)
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                  "cache:#{Rails.env}:#{key}"

                def enqueue_raw_event(raw_payload, source)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # Check for backpressure first
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  if backpressure?
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn("Raw events queue is full - backpressure applied")
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    raise QueueBackpressureError, "Too many pending events, please retry later"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # Create a simple payload wrapper with minimal metadata
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  payload_wrapper = {
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    id: SecureRandom.uuid,
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47.

      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48.

      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49.

      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50.

      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Convert symbol keys to strings for Sidekiq JSON serialization
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  string_keyed_payload = payload_wrapper.transform_keys(&:to_s)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # Enqueue the raw event using Sidekiq
          
      57.

                  RawEventJob.perform_async(string_keyed_payload)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  # Log with the expected message format
          
      60.

      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  true
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                rescue QueueBackpressureError => e
          
      63.

      64.

      99.

      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                # Process a batch of raw events (implemented for compatibility with the current design)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                # With Sidekiq, this is less important as individual jobs will process individual items
          
      102.

                def process_raw_event_batch(worker_id)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  # This is a no-op in Sidekiq implementation as Sidekiq
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  # processes individual jobs rather than batches
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  # It's retained for compatibility with the existing interface

                  Rails.logger.debug { "process_raw_event_batch called but not implemented in Sidekiq adapter" }
          
      110.

      112.

                # Gets current queue depths
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                # @return [Hash] A hash of queue names and their current size
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                def queue_depths
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  # Use the Sidekiq API to fetch queue sizes
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  stats = Sidekiq::Stats.new
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  queue_sizes = stats.queues
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  # Convert the queue names from Sidekiq format to our internal format
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  QUEUES.transform_values do |queue_name|
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    queue_sizes[queue_name] || 0
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                # Checks if any queues are experiencing backpressure
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] True if any queue is at or above its maximum size
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                def backpressure?
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  queue_depths.any? do |queue_key, depth|
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    depth >= MAX_QUEUE_SIZE[queue_key]
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                # Error class for queue backpressure

                class QueueBackpressureError < StandardError; end
          
      136.

                private
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                # Serializes an event for storage in Redis
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                # This is a placeholder method that should be implemented
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                # @param event [Domain::Event] The event to serialize
          
      142.

                # @return [Hash] A hash representation of the event
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                def serialize_event(event)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  {
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    id: event.id,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    type: event.name,
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    source: event.source,
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    timestamp: event.timestamp.iso8601,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    data: event.data,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    metadata: event.respond_to?(:metadata) ? (event.metadata || {}) : {}
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  }
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154.

                # Serializes a metric for storage in Redis
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                # This is a placeholder method that should be implemented
          
      156.

                # @param metric [Domain::Metric] The metric to serialize
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                # @return [Hash] A hash representation of the metric
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                def serialize_metric(metric)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  {
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    id: metric.id,
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    name: metric.name,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    value: metric.value,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    timestamp: metric.timestamp.iso8601,
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    dimensions: metric.dimensions
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  }
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            end
          
      169.

    app/adapters/repositories/alert_repository.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    31 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 31 lines missed.

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            require_relative "../../ports/storage_port"

            require_relative "../../core/domain/alert"

            module Repositories

              class AlertRepository
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                include StoragePort
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                def save_alert(alert)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  domain_alert = DomainAlert.from_domain_model(alert)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  domain_alert.to_domain_model.with_id(domain_alert.id.to_s)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                def find_alert(id)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  domain_alert = DomainAlert.find_by(id: id)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  domain_alert&.to_domain_model
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                def list_alerts(filters = {})
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  scope = DomainAlert.all
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  scope = scope.where(status: filters[:status].to_s) if filters[:status].present?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  scope = scope.by_severity(filters[:severity].to_s) if filters[:severity].present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  scope = scope.where(name: filters[:name]) if filters[:name].present?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  if filters[:from_timestamp].present? && filters[:to_timestamp].present?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    scope = scope.where(timestamp: filters[:from_timestamp]..filters[:to_timestamp])
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  elsif filters[:from_timestamp].present?
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    scope = scope.where("timestamp >= ?", filters[:from_timestamp])
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  elsif filters[:to_timestamp].present?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    scope = scope.where("timestamp <= ?", filters[:to_timestamp])
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  scope = scope.limit(filters[:limit]) if filters[:limit].present?
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  scope = filters[:recent] ? scope.order(timestamp: :desc) : scope.order(timestamp: :asc)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  scope.map(&:to_domain_model)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            end
          
      42.

    app/adapters/repositories/event_repository.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            require_relative "../../ports/storage_port"

            require_relative "../../core/domain/event_factory"
