            require_relative "../../ports/ingestion_port"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            require_relative "../../core/domain/event_factory"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            module Web
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              class WebAdapter
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                include IngestionPort
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Implements the IngestionPort interface
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Parses the raw payload and creates a Domain Event
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # @param raw_payload [String] The raw JSON webhook payload
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # @param source [String] The source system (github, jira, gitlab, etc.)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # @return [Domain::Event] A domain event
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                def receive_event(raw_payload, source:)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # Parse the JSON payload
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  parsed_payload = JSON.parse(raw_payload, symbolize_names: true)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  # Process the event based on source
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Create and return a domain event based on the source
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  case source
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  when "github"
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    handle_github_event(parsed_payload)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  when "jira"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    handle_jira_event(parsed_payload)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  when "gitlab"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    handle_gitlab_event(parsed_payload)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  when "bitbucket"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    handle_bitbucket_event(parsed_payload)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  else
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    handle_generic_event(parsed_payload, source)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Invalid JSON payload: #{e.message}")
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  raise InvalidPayloadError, "Invalid JSON payload"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Validate webhook signatures based on the source
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                # @param payload [String] The raw webhook payload
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # @param signature [String] The signature header
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] Whether the signature is valid
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                def validate_webhook_signature(payload, signature)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # Implementation would depend on each source's signature algorithm
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  # This would be delegated to specific signature validators
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  true # Placeholder implementation
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                private
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                # Handle GitHub specific event mapping
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                def handle_github_event(payload)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Process the GitHub event
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # Determine event type from payload
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # GitHub webhooks can have various formats depending on the event type
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  event_type = determine_github_event_type(payload)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  repository = payload.dig(:repository, :full_name) || "unknown"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  # Create a domain event using the EventFactory
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    Domain::EventFactory.create(
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      name: "github.#{event_type}",
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      source: "github",
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      data: payload,
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      timestamp: Time.current
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    )
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("Error creating event: #{e.message}")
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    raise e
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                # Helper method to determine GitHub event type from payload
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                def determine_github_event_type(payload)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  # The payload may have string keys instead of symbols when coming from demo_events.rb
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  # We'll support both by checking for string keys as well
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  ref_type = payload[:ref_type] || payload["ref_type"]
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  ref = payload[:ref] || payload["ref"]
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  has_commits = payload.key?(:commits) || payload.key?("commits")
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  is_deleted = payload[:deleted] || payload["deleted"]
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  # SPECIAL FOR CREATE EVENT: Use the fact that no action field indicates it's a "create" event
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  # This is an important check for our branch creation events
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  return "create" if ref_type && ref && !has_commits && !payload.key?(:action) && !payload.key?("action")
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  # Check for branch/tag creation events (create event)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  return "create" if ref_type && ref && !has_commits
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  # Check for branch/tag deletion events (delete event)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  return "delete" if ref_type && ref && is_deleted
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  # Check for push events
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  return "push" if ref && has_commits
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  # Remaining checks use the same pattern...
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  action = payload[:action] || payload["action"]
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  deployment = payload[:deployment] || payload["deployment"]
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  deployment_status = payload[:deployment_status] || payload["deployment_status"]
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  workflow_run = payload[:workflow_run] || payload["workflow_run"]
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  workflow_job = payload[:workflow_job] || payload["workflow_job"]
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  issue = payload[:issue] || payload["issue"]
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  pull_request = payload[:pull_request] || payload["pull_request"]
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  comment = payload[:comment] || payload["comment"]
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  review = payload[:review] || payload["review"]
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  check_run = payload[:check_run] || payload["check_run"]
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  check_suite = payload[:check_suite] || payload["check_suite"]
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  repository = payload[:repository] || payload["repository"]
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  # Check for deployment events
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  return "deployment.#{action}" if deployment && action
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

            
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  # Check for deployment status events
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  return "deployment_status.#{action}" if deployment_status && action
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  # Check for workflow run events
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  return "workflow_run.#{action}" if workflow_run && action
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  # Check for workflow job events
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  return "workflow_job.#{action}" if workflow_job && action
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  # Check for issue events
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  return "issues.#{action}" if action && issue && !comment
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  # Check for pull request events
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  return "pull_request.#{action}" if action && pull_request && !comment && !review
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  # Check for issue comment events
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  return "issue_comment.#{action}" if action && comment && issue
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  # Check for PR comment events
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  return "pull_request_review_comment.#{action}" if action && comment && pull_request
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  # Check for pull request review events
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  return "pull_request_review.#{action}" if action && review && pull_request
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  # Check for check run events
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  return "check_run.#{action}" if action && check_run
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  # Check for check suite events
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  return "check_suite.#{action}" if action && check_suite
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  # Check for repository events
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  return "repository.#{action}" if action && repository && !issue && !pull_request
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  # Generic fallback
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  # If we have an action but couldn't categorize the event, use it
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  return "#{action}" if action
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  # Last resort fallback
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  "unknown"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                # Handle Jira specific event mapping
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                def handle_jira_event(payload)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  event_type = payload[:webhookEvent] || "unknown"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  issue_key = payload.dig(:issue, :key) || "unknown"
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  Domain::EventFactory.create(
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    name: "jira.#{event_type}",
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    source: "jira",
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    data: payload,
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.current
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  )
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                # Handle GitLab specific event mapping
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                def handle_gitlab_event(payload)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  event_type = payload[:object_kind] || "unknown"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  project = payload.dig(:project, :path_with_namespace) || "unknown"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  Domain::EventFactory.create(
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    name: "gitlab.#{event_type}",
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                    source: "gitlab",
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    data: payload,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.current
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  )
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                # Handle Bitbucket specific event mapping
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                def handle_bitbucket_event(payload)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  event_type = payload[:event_key] || "unknown"
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  repository = payload.dig(:repository, :full_name) || "unknown"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  Domain::EventFactory.create(
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    name: "bitbucket.#{event_type}",
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    source: "bitbucket",
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    data: payload,
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.current
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  )
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                # Generic handler for other sources
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                def handle_generic_event(payload, source)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  # Extract a reasonable event name or use a default
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  event_type = payload[:type] || payload[:event] || payload[:action] || "event"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  Domain::EventFactory.create(
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    name: "#{source}.#{event_type}",
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    source: source,
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    data: payload,
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.current
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  )
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                class InvalidPayloadError < StandardError; end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            end
          
      210.

    app/adapters/web/webhooks_controller.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    108 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 108 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            require_relative "../../ports/ingestion_port"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            module Web
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              class WebhooksController < ApplicationController
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                skip_before_action :verify_authenticity_token
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                before_action :authenticate_webhook!, only: [:create]
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                include IngestionPort
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                def create
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  # Extract the payload and source
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  payload = request.raw_post
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  source = params[:source]
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Received webhook from source: #{source}")
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  # For GitHub webhooks, get all relevant headers
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  if source == "github"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    github_headers = {}
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    request.headers.each do |key, value|
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      github_headers[key] = value if key.to_s.downcase.include?("github") ||
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                                                     key.to_s.downcase.include?("hub") ||
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                                                     key.to_s.downcase == "x-hub-signature" ||
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                                                     key.to_s.downcase == "x-hub-signature-256"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info("GitHub webhook headers: #{github_headers.inspect}")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  # Validate the signature if present
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  signature = request.headers["X-Hub-Signature-256"] || request.headers["X-Hub-Signature"]
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  if signature.present? && !validate_webhook_signature(payload, signature, source)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn("Invalid webhook signature for source: #{source}")
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    return render json: { error: "Invalid signature" }, status: :unauthorized
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # Process the webhook payload
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  receive_event(payload, source)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  render json: { status: "received" }, status: :accepted
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Webhook processing error: #{e.message}")
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error(e.backtrace.join("\n"))
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  render json: { error: e.message }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                def receive_event(payload, source)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # Implementation of IngestionPort#receive_event
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Processing webhook event from #{source}")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Here you would normally process the event
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  # This could involve parsing the payload and sending it to a use case
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # For debugging purposes
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    parsed_payload = JSON.parse(payload)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    event_type = parsed_payload["type"] ||
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                                 parsed_payload["action"] ||
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                                 parsed_payload["event"] ||
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                                 (parsed_payload["ref"] && "push") ||
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                                 "unknown"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug { "Event type: #{event_type}" }
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error("Failed to parse webhook payload: #{e.message}")
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  true # Return success
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                def validate_webhook_signature(payload, signature, source)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  # Implementation of IngestionPort#validate_webhook_signature
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Validating webhook signature for source: #{source}")
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  # Get the secret for this source
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  secret = WebhookAuthenticator.secret_for(source)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  if secret.nil?
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn("No webhook secret configured for source: #{source}")
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    return false
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  # For GitHub webhooks, verify the signature
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  if source == "github" && signature.present?
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    # GitHub prefers SHA-256 over SHA-1
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    if signature.start_with?("sha256=")
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      # SHA-256 signature validation
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      expected_signature = "sha256=" + OpenSSL::HMAC.hexdigest(OpenSSL::Digest.new("sha256"), secret, payload)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                      # Log signature details (first few chars only for security)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("Validating GitHub SHA-256 signature")
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug { "Payload first 50 chars: #{payload[0..50]}..." }
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug { "Secret first 4 chars: #{secret[0..3]}..." }
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("Signature comparison - Expected: #{expected_signature[0..15]}... Received: #{signature[0..15]}...")
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      # Use secure comparison to prevent timing attacks as recommended by GitHub
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      result = Rack::Utils.secure_compare(expected_signature, signature)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("SHA-256 signature validation result: #{result ? 'Valid' : 'Invalid'}")
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      return result
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    elsif signature.start_with?("sha1=")
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      # SHA-1 signature validation (legacy)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      expected_signature = "sha1=" + OpenSSL::HMAC.hexdigest(OpenSSL::Digest.new("sha1"), secret, payload)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      # Log signature details
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("Validating GitHub SHA-1 signature (legacy)")
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug { "Payload first 50 chars: #{payload[0..50]}..." }
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.debug { "Secret first 4 chars: #{secret[0..3]}..." }
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("Signature comparison - Expected: #{expected_signature[0..15]}... Received: #{signature[0..15]}...")
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      # Use secure comparison
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      result = Rack::Utils.secure_compare(expected_signature, signature)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("SHA-1 signature validation result: #{result ? 'Valid' : 'Invalid'}")
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      return result
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    else
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      # Unknown signature format
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn("Unknown GitHub signature format: #{signature[0..10]}...")
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      return false
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  # For other sources, implement appropriate signature validation
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  # or return true if signature validation is not required
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  true
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                private
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                def authenticate_webhook!
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  token = request.headers["X-Webhook-Token"] ||
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                          extract_token_from_authorization
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  source = params[:source]
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Authenticating webhook from source: #{source}")
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  # GitHub uses signature-based authentication
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  if source == "github"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    signature = request.headers["X-Hub-Signature-256"] || request.headers["X-Hub-Signature"]
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    if signature.present?
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      # We'll validate the signature in the validate_webhook_signature method
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                      return true
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn("GitHub webhook received with no signature headers")
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  # Skip authentication in development
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  return true if Rails.env.local?
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  unless token && WebhookAuthenticator.valid?(token, source)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn("Webhook authentication failed for source: #{source}")
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: "Unauthorized" }, status: :unauthorized
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                    return false
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  true
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                def extract_token_from_authorization
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  auth_header = request.headers["Authorization"]
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  return nil unless auth_header&.start_with?("Bearer ")
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  auth_header.gsub("Bearer ", "")
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            end
          
      169.

    app/controllers/api/v1/events_controller.rb

            module Api

                class EventsController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  # Disable CSRF for webhooks; use token auth instead
          
      5.

                  skip_before_action :verify_authenticity_token
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  before_action :authenticate_source!, only: [:create]

                  before_action :store_headers, only: [:create]

                  def show

                    use_case = UseCaseFactory.create_find_event

                    event = use_case.call(params[:id])

    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    if event

                      render json: event.to_h

    15.

                      render json: { error: "Event not found" }, status: :not_found

                  rescue StandardError => e
