                    render json: { error: e.message }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  def create
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    # Get the raw JSON payload and source parameter
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    raw_payload = request.raw_post
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    source = params.require(:source)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    # Log incoming request at debug level
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug { "EventsController#create received #{source} webhook" }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    # Log which headers we have for GitHub webhooks
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    if source == "github"
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("GitHub webhook received with headers: #{relevant_github_headers.inspect}")
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      # Quick validation of the payload (minimal processing)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      JSON.parse(raw_payload) # Just check if valid JSON
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      # Get the queue adapter
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      queue_adapter = DependencyContainer.resolve(:queue_port)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      # Enqueue the raw event for async processing
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      event_id = SecureRandom.uuid
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      enqueued = queue_adapter.enqueue_raw_event(raw_payload, source)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      if enqueued
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                        # Return 202 Accepted immediately - we'll process it asynchronously
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                        render json: {
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                          id: event_id,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                          status: "accepted",
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                          message: "Event accepted for processing"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        }, status: :accepted
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      else
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                        # Something went wrong with enqueuing
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                        render json: {
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                          error: "Unable to queue event for processing"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                        }, status: :service_unavailable
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                      end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                      # Invalid JSON payload
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error { "Invalid JSON payload: #{e.message}" }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      render json: { error: "Invalid JSON payload" }, status: :bad_request
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    rescue Adapters::Queue::RedisQueueAdapter::QueueBackpressureError => e
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      # Queue is experiencing backpressure
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error { "Queue backpressure: #{e.message}" }
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        error: "Service is under heavy load, please retry later",
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        retry_after: 30
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      }, status: :too_many_requests, headers: { "Retry-After": "30" }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    rescue ActionController::ParameterMissing => e
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      # Missing required parameter
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error { "Parameter missing: #{e.message}" }
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      render json: { error: e.message }, status: :bad_request
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      # Unexpected error
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error { "Error in EventsController#create: #{e.class.name} - #{e.message}" }
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error { e.backtrace.join("\n") }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      render json: { error: "Internal server error" }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    ensure
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                      # Clear thread-local headers after processing
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      Thread.current[:http_headers] = nil
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  private
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  def store_headers
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    # Store relevant headers in thread-local storage for the adapter to access
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    Thread.current[:http_headers] = relevant_headers
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  def relevant_headers
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    {
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      "X-GitHub-Event" => request.headers["X-GitHub-Event"],
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      "X-GitHub-Delivery" => request.headers["X-GitHub-Delivery"],
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      "X-Hub-Signature" => request.headers["X-Hub-Signature"],
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                      "X-Hub-Signature-256" => request.headers["X-Hub-Signature-256"],
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      "User-Agent" => request.headers["User-Agent"],
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      "Content-Type" => request.headers["Content-Type"]
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    }.compact
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  def relevant_github_headers
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    headers = {}
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    headers["X-GitHub-Event"] = request.headers["X-GitHub-Event"] if request.headers["X-GitHub-Event"].present?
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    if request.headers["X-GitHub-Delivery"].present?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                      headers["X-GitHub-Delivery"] =
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                        request.headers["X-GitHub-Delivery"]
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    headers
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  def authenticate_source!
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    source = params[:source]
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    # Log authentication attempt
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info("Webhook authentication attempt for source: #{source}")
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    # Always allow in development/test mode
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    return true if Rails.env.local?
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    # For GitHub webhooks, use signature validation
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    if source == "github"
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("GitHub webhook headers: #{relevant_github_headers.inspect}")
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                      # Check for signature headers - prefer SHA-256 over SHA-1
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      signature = request.headers["X-Hub-Signature-256"]
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("GitHub SHA-256 signature present: #{!signature.nil?}")
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                      if signature.present?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                        # Get the webhook secret
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                        secret = WebhookAuthenticator.secret_for("github")
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                        if secret.nil?
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.warn("No GitHub webhook secret configured")
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                          head :unauthorized
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                          return false
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                        end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                        # Get raw payload
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                        payload = request.raw_post
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                        # Verify the signature using HMAC-SHA256
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                        expected_signature = "sha256=" + OpenSSL::HMAC.hexdigest(OpenSSL::Digest.new("sha256"), secret, payload)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                        # Log signature details (first 10 chars only for security)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info("Signature comparison - Expected: #{expected_signature[0..15]}... Received: #{signature[0..15]}...")
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                        # Use secure comparison to prevent timing attacks
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                        is_valid = Rack::Utils.secure_compare(expected_signature, signature)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                        unless is_valid
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.warn("GitHub signature validation failed")
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                          head :unauthorized
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                          return false
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                        end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.info("GitHub signature validation successful")
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                        return true
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      else
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                        # Fall back to SHA-1 for legacy support
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                        signature = request.headers["X-Hub-Signature"]
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                        if signature.present?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.info("Falling back to SHA-1 signature validation")
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                          # Get the webhook secret
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                          secret = WebhookAuthenticator.secret_for("github")
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

            
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                          if secret.nil?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                            Rails.logger.warn("No GitHub webhook secret configured")
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                            head :unauthorized
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                            return false
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                          end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                          # Get raw payload
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                          payload = request.raw_post
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                          # Verify the signature using HMAC-SHA1
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                          expected_signature = "sha1=" + OpenSSL::HMAC.hexdigest(OpenSSL::Digest.new("sha1"), secret, payload)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                          # Log signature details (first 10 chars only for security)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.info("Signature comparison - Expected: #{expected_signature[0..15]}... Received: #{signature[0..15]}...")
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                          # Use secure comparison to prevent timing attacks
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                          is_valid = Rack::Utils.secure_compare(expected_signature, signature)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                          unless is_valid
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                            Rails.logger.warn("GitHub SHA-1 signature validation failed")
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                            head :unauthorized
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                            return false
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                          end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.info("GitHub SHA-1 signature validation successful")
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                          return true
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                        else
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                          Rails.logger.warn("No GitHub signature headers found")
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                        end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                      end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    # For other sources, fall back to token authentication
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                    token = request.headers["X-Webhook-Token"] ||
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                            auth_header_token
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

            
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info("Token present: #{!token.nil?}")
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info("Authorization header present: #{!request.headers['Authorization'].nil?}")
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info("X-Webhook-Token header present: #{!request.headers['X-Webhook-Token'].nil?}")
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                    # Authenticate the token for the given source
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    is_valid = token && WebhookAuthenticator.valid?(token, source)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                    unless is_valid
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.warn("Webhook authentication failed for source: #{source}")
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                      head :unauthorized
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                      return false
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    true
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

            
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  def auth_header_token
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    # Extract token from Authorization: Bearer <token>
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                    auth_header = request.headers["Authorization"]
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    return nil unless auth_header&.start_with?("Bearer ")
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

            
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                    auth_header.gsub("Bearer ", "")
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            end
          
      233.

                class MetricsController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                  def index
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                    use_case = UseCaseFactory.create_list_metrics
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                    metrics = use_case.call(filter_params)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    render json: metrics.map(&:to_h)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10.

    11. 
            

            

                  end
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13.

                  def show
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    use_case = UseCaseFactory.create_find_metric
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    metric = use_case.call(params[:id])

    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    if metric

    19.

      25.

      26.

                  def analyze
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    use_case = UseCaseFactory.create_detect_anomalies
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    alert = use_case.call(params[:id])

      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    if alert

      32.

                        metric_id: params[:id],
          
      33.

      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

      35.

      36.

                    else
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      render json: {
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                        metric_id: params[:id],
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                        status: 'normal'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    render json: { error: e.message }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  private
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  def filter_params
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    params.permit(:source, :name, :from_date, :to_date)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            end
          
      54.

    2 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 2 lines missed.

            class ApplicationController < ActionController::Base

            class DashboardsController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def engineering
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Get time range from params with logging
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                @days = (params[:days] || 30).to_i
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Dashboard filtering for #{@days} days")
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # Store selected period for UI highlighting
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @selected_period = @days
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Get all metrics with proper error handling
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  # Get repository metrics
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  @repo_metrics = fetch_repository_metrics(@days)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Error fetching repository metrics: #{e.message}")
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  @repo_metrics = default_repo_metrics
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20.

                begin

                rescue StandardError => e

      55.

      56.

              def fetch_repository_metrics(days = 30)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                metrics_service = ServiceFactory.create_metrics_service
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                {
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  # Daily push counts by repository
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  push_counts: metrics_service.aggregate_metrics("github.push.total", "daily", days),
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  # Recent active repositories
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  active_repos: metrics_service.top_metrics("github.push.total",
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                                                            dimension: "repository",
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                                                            limit: 5,
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                                                            days: days),
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  # Commit volume - use daily aggregates
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  commit_volume: metrics_service.aggregate_metrics("github.push.commits.daily", "daily", days),
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  # PR metrics
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  pr_metrics: {
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    open: metrics_service.aggregate_metrics("github.pull_request.opened", "daily", days),
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    closed: metrics_service.aggregate_metrics("github.pull_request.closed", "daily", days),
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    merged: metrics_service.aggregate_metrics("github.pull_request.merged", "daily", days)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  }
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                }
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

              end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              def fetch_cicd_metrics(days = 30)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                metrics_service = ServiceFactory.create_metrics_service
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                {
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  # Build statistics
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  builds: {
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    total: metrics_service.aggregate_metrics("ci.build.total", "daily", days),
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    success_rate: metrics_service.success_rate("ci.build", days),
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    avg_duration: metrics_service.average_metric("ci.build.duration", days)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  },
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  # Deployment statistics
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  deployments: {
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    total: metrics_service.aggregate_metrics("ci.deploy.total", "daily", days),
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    success_rate: metrics_service.success_rate("ci.deploy", days),
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    avg_duration: metrics_service.average_metric("ci.deploy.duration", days)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  }
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                }
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              def fetch_dora_metrics(days = 30)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                # Try to get pre-calculated DORA metrics from the database
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                metric_repository = DependencyContainer.resolve(:metric_repository)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                # We need to handle how the period_days value is stored in the database
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                # It's stored as an integer in the JSON dimensions
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Looking for pre-calculated DORA metrics with period_days=#{days}")
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # Deployment Frequency - Find any metrics with the exact period_days value
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                deployment_frequency_metrics = DomainMetric.where(name: "dora.deployment_frequency")
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                                                           .where("dimensions->>'period_days' = ?", days.to_s)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                                                           .order(recorded_at: :desc)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                                                           .limit(1)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                deployment_frequency_metric = deployment_frequency_metrics.first
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                # Lead Time
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                lead_time_metrics = DomainMetric.where(name: "dora.lead_time")
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                                                .where("dimensions->>'period_days' = ?", days.to_s)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                                                .order(recorded_at: :desc)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                                                .limit(1)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                lead_time_metric = lead_time_metrics.first
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                # Time to Restore
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                time_to_restore_metrics = DomainMetric.where(name: "dora.time_to_restore")
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                                                      .where("dimensions->>'period_days' = ?", days.to_s)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                                                      .order(recorded_at: :desc)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                                                      .limit(1)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                time_to_restore_metric = time_to_restore_metrics.first
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                # Change Failure Rate
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                change_failure_rate_metrics = DomainMetric.where(name: "dora.change_failure_rate")
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                                                          .where("dimensions->>'period_days' = ?", days.to_s)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                                                          .order(recorded_at: :desc)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                                                          .limit(1)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                change_failure_rate_metric = change_failure_rate_metrics.first
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                # If we found all pre-calculated metrics, use them
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                if deployment_frequency_metric && lead_time_metric &&
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                   time_to_restore_metric && change_failure_rate_metric
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Using pre-calculated DORA metrics for #{days} days period")
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  return {
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                    # Deployment Frequency
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    deployment_frequency: {
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                      value: deployment_frequency_metric.value,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                      rating: deployment_frequency_metric.dimensions["rating"],
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                      days_with_deployments: deployment_frequency_metric.dimensions["days_with_deployments"].to_i,
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                      total_days: days,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      total_deployments: deployment_frequency_metric.dimensions["total_deployments"].to_i
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    },
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    # Lead Time for Changes
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    lead_time: {
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                      value: lead_time_metric.value,
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      rating: lead_time_metric.dimensions["rating"],
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                      sample_size: lead_time_metric.dimensions["sample_size"].to_i
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    },
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    # Time to Restore Service
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    time_to_restore: {
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                      value: time_to_restore_metric.value,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                      rating: time_to_restore_metric.dimensions["rating"],
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                      sample_size: time_to_restore_metric.dimensions["sample_size"].to_i
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    },
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    # Change Failure Rate
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    change_failure_rate: {
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                      value: change_failure_rate_metric.value,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                      rating: change_failure_rate_metric.dimensions["rating"],
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      failures: change_failure_rate_metric.dimensions["failures"].to_f,
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      deployments: change_failure_rate_metric.dimensions["deployments"].to_f
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    }
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  }
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # If pre-calculated metrics are not available, calculate them on-demand
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Pre-calculated DORA metrics not found, calculating on-demand for #{days} days period")
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                dora_service = ServiceFactory.create_dora_service
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                {
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  # Deployment Frequency
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  deployment_frequency: dora_service.deployment_frequency(days),
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  # Lead Time for Changes
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  lead_time: dora_service.lead_time_for_changes(days),
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190.

              def database_status

                # Checks if the actuator supports a specific action

                def supports_action?(action)

    35.

                # Validates that required parameters are present
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # @param params [Hash] The parameters to validate
          
      40.

                # @param required [Array<Symbol>] List of required parameter keys
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # @raise [ArgumentError] If any required parameters are missing
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                def validate_required_params(params, required)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  missing = required.select { |param| params[param].nil? }
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  return if missing.empty?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Missing required parameters: #{missing.join(', ')}"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            end

              class Alert

                def initialize(name:, severity:, metric:, threshold:, id: nil, timestamp: Time.now, status: :active)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @id = id

                def message

                  "#{name} - #{metric.name} exceeded threshold of #{threshold}"

      24.

                def details

                def valid?

    41. 
            

            

                  name.present? &&
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    SEVERITIES.include?(severity) &&
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    !metric.nil? && metric.is_a?(Domain::Metric) &&

                def validate!
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Name cannot be empty" if name.nil? || name.empty?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Severity must be one of: #{SEVERITIES.join(', ')}" unless SEVERITIES.include?(severity)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Metric cannot be nil" if metric.nil?
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Metric must be a Domain::Metric" unless metric.is_a?(Domain::Metric)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Threshold cannot be nil" if threshold.nil?
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Timestamp must be a Time object" unless timestamp.is_a?(Time)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Status must be one of: #{STATUSES.join(', ')}" unless STATUSES.include?(status)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                end
          
      58.

                def ==(other)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  return false unless other.is_a?(Alert)
          
      62.
