    app/core/domain/automation_rule.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    123 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 123 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            module Domain
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Represents an automation rule in the system
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # An automation rule consists of a set of conditions and actions
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # When all conditions are met, the actions are executed
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              class AutomationRule
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                attr_reader :id, :name, :description, :conditions, :actions, :enabled, :created_at, :updated_at
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Initialize a new automation rule
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # @param id [String] Unique identifier for the rule
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # @param name [String] Human-readable name for the rule
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # @param description [String] Detailed description of what the rule does
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # @param conditions [Array<Hash>] Conditions that must be met for the rule to trigger
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # @param actions [Array<Hash>] Actions to execute when conditions are met
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                # @param enabled [Boolean] Whether the rule is currently active
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # @param created_at [Time] When the rule was created
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # @param updated_at [Time] When the rule was last updated
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                def initialize(id:, name:, conditions:, actions:, description: nil, enabled: true, created_at: Time.now,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                               updated_at: Time.now)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  @id = id
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  @name = name
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  @description = description
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  @conditions = conditions
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  @actions = actions
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  @enabled = enabled
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  @created_at = created_at
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  @updated_at = updated_at
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  validate!
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # Evaluates all conditions and returns whether they are all satisfied
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # @param context [Hash] The evaluation context containing sensors and state data
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] True if all conditions are met, false otherwise
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                def conditions_met?(context)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  return false unless enabled
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # All conditions must be met for the rule to trigger
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  conditions.all? { |condition| evaluate_condition(condition, context) }
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # Executes all actions defined in the rule
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                # @param context [Hash] The execution context containing available actuators
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # @return [Array<Hash>] Results of each action execution
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                def execute_actions(context)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  return [] unless enabled
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  actions.map { |action| execute_action(action, context) }
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                # Evaluates a single condition
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                # @param condition [Hash] The condition to evaluate
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                # @param context [Hash] The evaluation context
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] Whether the condition is met
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                def evaluate_condition(condition, context)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  entity_id = condition[:entity_id]
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  attribute = condition[:attribute]
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  operator = condition[:operator]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  value = condition[:value]
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  return false unless context[:entities]&.key?(entity_id)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  entity = context[:entities][entity_id]
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  current_value = entity[attribute]
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  compare_values(current_value, operator, value)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                # Executes a single action
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                # @param action [Hash] The action to execute
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # @param context [Hash] The execution context
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                # @return [Hash] The result of the action execution
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                def execute_action(action, context)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  actuator_id = action[:actuator_id]
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  command = action[:command].to_sym
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  params = action[:params] || {}
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  unless context[:actuators]&.key?(actuator_id)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    return { success: false,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                             error: "Actuator not found: #{actuator_id}" }
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  actuator = context[:actuators][actuator_id]
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  return { success: false, error: "Unsupported action: #{command}" } unless actuator.supports_action?(command)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    result = actuator.execute(params.merge(command: command))
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    {
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      success: result[:success],
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      actuator_id: actuator_id,
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      command: command,
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      result: result
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    }
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  rescue StandardError => e
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    {
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      success: false,
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      actuator_id: actuator_id,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                      command: command,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      error: e.message
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    }
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                # Toggles the enabled state of the rule
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] The new enabled state
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                def toggle_enabled
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  @enabled = !@enabled
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  @updated_at = Time.now
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  @enabled
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                private
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                # Compares two values using the specified operator
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                # @param current_value [Object] The current value
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                # @param operator [String] The comparison operator
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                # @param target_value [Object] The target value to compare against
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                # @return [Boolean] The result of the comparison
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                def compare_values(current_value, operator, target_value)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  case operator
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  when "eq", "=="
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    current_value == target_value
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  when "neq", "!="
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    current_value != target_value
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  when "gt", ">"
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    current_value.to_f > target_value.to_f
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  when "gte", ">="
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    current_value.to_f >= target_value.to_f
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  when "lt", "<"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    current_value.to_f < target_value.to_f
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  when "lte", "<="
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    current_value.to_f <= target_value.to_f
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  when "contains"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    current_value.to_s.include?(target_value.to_s)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  when "not_contains"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    !current_value.to_s.include?(target_value.to_s)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  when "starts_with"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    current_value.to_s.start_with?(target_value.to_s)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  when "ends_with"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    current_value.to_s.end_with?(target_value.to_s)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  when "between"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    range = target_value.first.to_f..target_value.last.to_f
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    range.include?(current_value.to_f)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  when "in"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    Array(target_value).include?(current_value)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  when "not_in"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    !Array(target_value).include?(current_value)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  when "present"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    !current_value.nil? && current_value != ""
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  when "blank"
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    current_value.nil? || current_value == ""
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  else
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    false
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                def validate!
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "ID cannot be empty" if id.nil? || id.empty?
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Name cannot be empty" if name.nil? || name.empty?
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Conditions must be an array" unless conditions.is_a?(Array)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Actions must be an array" unless actions.is_a?(Array)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "At least one condition is required" if conditions.empty?
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "At least one action is required" if actions.empty?
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  # Validate each condition has required fields
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  conditions.each do |condition|
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                    unless condition.is_a?(Hash) && condition[:entity_id] && condition[:attribute] && condition[:operator]
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Each condition must have entity_id, attribute, and operator"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  # Validate each action has required fields
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  actions.each do |action|
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                    unless action.is_a?(Hash) && action[:actuator_id] && action[:command]
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Each action must have actuator_id and command"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            end
          
      184.

    app/core/domain/classifiers/base_classifier.rb

    0.0% lines covered

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            module Domain

    4. 
            

            

              module Classifiers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # BaseClassifier defines the interface for all event classifiers
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # This is the parent class for all source-specific classifiers like GithubClassifier, JiraClassifier, etc.
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                class BaseClassifier
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  attr_reader :dimension_extractor
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  # Initialize with an optional dimension extractor
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  # @param dimension_extractor [Domain::Extractors::DimensionExtractor] Extractor for event dimensions
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  def initialize(dimension_extractor = nil)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    @dimension_extractor = dimension_extractor
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # Classify an event and return metric definitions
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The event to classify
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] A hash with a :metrics key containing an array of metric definitions
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  def classify(event)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    raise NotImplementedError, "Subclasses must implement classify method"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23.

                  # Helper method to create a metric definition
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # @param name [String] The metric name
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  # @param value [Numeric] The metric value
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  # @param dimensions [Hash] The metric dimensions
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] A metric definition hash
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  def create_metric(name:, value:, dimensions: {})
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    {
          
      30.

                      name: name,
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      value: value,

                      dimensions: dimensions
          
      33.

    34. 
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # Helper method to extract event sub type and action
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The event to extract from
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  # @param prefix [String] The event source prefix to remove
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  # @return [Array<String>] The event sub type and action
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  def extract_event_parts(event, prefix)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    # Remove the prefix (e.g., "github.") from the event name
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    event_subtype = event.name.sub("#{prefix}.", "")
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    # Split by dot to get event type and action
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    parts = event_subtype.split(".")
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    if parts.length >= 2
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                      [parts[0], parts[1]]
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    else
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      [parts[0], nil]
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            end
          
      56.

    app/core/domain/classifiers/bitbucket_event_classifier.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            module Domain
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              module Classifiers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # BitbucketEventClassifier is responsible for analyzing Bitbucket events and determining
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # which metrics should be created from them.
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                class BitbucketEventClassifier < BaseClassifier
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  # Classify a Bitbucket event and return metric definitions
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The Bitbucket event to classify
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] A hash with a :metrics key containing an array of metric definitions
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  def classify(event)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    # Extract the subtype from the event name (everything after "bitbucket.")
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    event_subtype = event.name.sub("bitbucket.", "")
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    case event_subtype
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    when /^repo:push$/
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      classify_push_event(event)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    when /^pullrequest:(created|approved|merged|rejected)$/
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      action = ::Regexp.last_match(1)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      classify_pullrequest_event(event, action)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    else
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      # Generic Bitbucket event
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      {
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                        metrics: [
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                          create_metric(
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                            name: "bitbucket.#{event_subtype}.total",
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_dimensions(event)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                          )
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      }
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  private
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  def extract_dimensions(event)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    @dimension_extractor ? @dimension_extractor.extract_bitbucket_dimensions(event) : {}
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  def classify_push_event(event)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    dimensions = extract_dimensions(event)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    commit_count = @dimension_extractor ? @dimension_extractor.extract_bitbucket_commit_count(event) : 1
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    {
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                      metrics: [
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                          name: "bitbucket.push.total",
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        ),
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                          name: "bitbucket.push.commits",
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                          value: commit_count,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                        )
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                      ]
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  def classify_pullrequest_event(event, action)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    dimensions = extract_dimensions(event)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    {
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      metrics: [
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                          name: "bitbucket.pullrequest.total",
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions.merge(action: action)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                        ),
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                          name: "bitbucket.pullrequest.#{action}",
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                        )
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      ]
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            end
          
      82.

    app/core/domain/classifiers/github_event_classifier.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    281 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 281 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            module Domain
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              module Classifiers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # GithubEventClassifier is responsible for analyzing GitHub events and determining
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # which metrics should be created from them.
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                class GithubEventClassifier < BaseClassifier
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  # Classify a GitHub event and return metric definitions
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The GitHub event to classify
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] A hash with a :metrics key containing an array of metric definitions
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  def classify(event)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    # Extract the main event type and action from the event name
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    # Format should be: github.[event_name].[action]
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    _, event_name, action = event.name.split(".")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    # Handle GitHub events based on standardized event names from GitHub Webhook API
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    case event_name
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    when "push"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      classify_push_event(event)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    when "pull_request"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      classify_pull_request_event(event, action)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    when "issues"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      classify_issues_event(event, action)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    when "check_run"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      classify_check_run_event(event, action)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    when "check_suite"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      classify_check_suite_event(event, action)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    when "create"
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                      classify_create_event(event)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    when "delete"
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      classify_delete_event(event)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    when "deployment"
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                      classify_deployment_event(event)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    when "deployment_status"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      classify_deployment_status_event(event, action)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    when "workflow_run"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      classify_workflow_run_event(event, action)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    when "workflow_job"
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      classify_workflow_job_event(event, action)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    when "workflow_dispatch"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      classify_workflow_dispatch_event(event)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    else
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      # Generic GitHub event
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                      {
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                        metrics: [
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                          create_metric(
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                            name: "github.#{event_name}.#{action || 'total'}",
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_dimensions(event)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                          )
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                      }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  private
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  def extract_dimensions(event)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    @dimension_extractor ? @dimension_extractor.extract_github_dimensions(event) : {}
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  def classify_push_event(event)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    dimensions = extract_dimensions(event)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    {
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      metrics: [
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        # Count of push events
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                          name: "github.push.total",
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                        ),
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                        # Count of commits in this push
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                          name: "github.push.commits",
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                          value: @dimension_extractor ? @dimension_extractor.extract_commit_count(event) : 1,
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                        ),
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                        # Track unique authors
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                          name: "github.push.unique_authors",
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions.merge(
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                            author: @dimension_extractor ? @dimension_extractor.extract_author(event) : "unknown"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                          )
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                        ),
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                        # Track commits by branch
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                          name: "github.push.branch_activity",
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions.merge(
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                            branch: @dimension_extractor ? @dimension_extractor.extract_branch(event) : "unknown"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                          )
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                        )
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      ]
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    }
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98.

                  def classify_pull_request_event(event, action)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    # Default to 'total' if action is nil
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    action ||= "total"
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    dimensions = extract_dimensions(event)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    {
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      metrics: [

    109. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions.merge(action: action)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                        ),
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        # PR action count (opened, closed, merged, etc.)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114.

      115.

                  def classify_issues_event(event, action)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132.

    133. 
            

            

                    action ||= "total"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    dimensions = extract_dimensions(event)

    135.

                    {

                  def classify_check_run_event(event, action)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    # Default to 'total' if action is nil
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    action ||= "total"
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                    {
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                      metrics: [
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                          name: "github.check_run.#{action}",
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                          dimensions: extract_dimensions(event)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                        )
