      335.

    app/core/domain/classifiers/jira_event_classifier.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    69 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 69 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            module Domain
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              module Classifiers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # JiraEventClassifier is responsible for analyzing Jira events and determining
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # which metrics should be created from them.
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                class JiraEventClassifier < BaseClassifier
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  # Classify a Jira event and return metric definitions
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The Jira event to classify
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] A hash with a :metrics key containing an array of metric definitions
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  def classify(event)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    # Extract the subtype from the event name (everything after "jira.")
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    event_subtype = event.name.sub("jira.", "")
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    case event_subtype
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    when /^issue_(created|updated|resolved|deleted)$/
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      action = ::Regexp.last_match(1)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      classify_issue_event(event, action)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    when /^sprint_(started|closed)$/
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      action = ::Regexp.last_match(1)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      classify_sprint_event(event, action)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    else
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      # Generic Jira event
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      {
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                        metrics: [
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                          create_metric(
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                            name: "jira.#{event_subtype}.total",
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_dimensions(event)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                          )
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                      }
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  private
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  def extract_dimensions(event)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    @dimension_extractor ? @dimension_extractor.extract_jira_dimensions(event) : {}
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  def classify_issue_event(event, action)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    dimensions = extract_dimensions(event)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    issue_type = @dimension_extractor ? @dimension_extractor.extract_jira_issue_type(event) : "unknown"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    {
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      metrics: [
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                        # Total issues
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                          name: "jira.issue.total",
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions.merge(action: action)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                        ),
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                        # Issues by action type
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                          name: "jira.issue.#{action}",
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                        ),
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                        # Issues by type
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                          name: "jira.issue.by_type",
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions.merge(
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                            issue_type: issue_type,
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                            action: action
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                          )
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        )
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      ]
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    }
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  def classify_sprint_event(event, action)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    dimensions = extract_dimensions(event)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    {
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      metrics: [
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                        create_metric(
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                          name: "jira.sprint.#{action}",
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                          value: 1,
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                          dimensions: dimensions
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        )
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      ]
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    }
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

            end
          
      89.

    app/core/domain/classifiers/metric_classifier.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2.

            module Domain
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              module Classifiers
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # The MetricClassifier is responsible for analyzing events and determining
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # which metrics should be created from them.
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                #
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # It maps different event types to appropriate metrics with their dimensions,
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # creating a configurable way to generate metrics from incoming events.
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                class MetricClassifier
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  attr_reader :github_classifier, :jira_classifier, :gitlab_classifier,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                              :bitbucket_classifier, :ci_classifier, :task_classifier,
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                              :generic_classifier, :dimension_extractor
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  # Initialize the classifier with optional source-specific classifiers
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  # @param classifiers [Hash] A hash of source-specific classifiers
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  # @param dimension_extractor [Domain::Extractors::DimensionExtractor] Dimension extractor
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  def initialize(classifiers = {}, dimension_extractor = nil)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    @dimension_extractor = dimension_extractor || Domain::Extractors::DimensionExtractor.new
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    # Initialize source-specific classifiers
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    @github_classifier = classifiers[:github]
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    @jira_classifier = classifiers[:jira]
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    @gitlab_classifier = classifiers[:gitlab]
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    @bitbucket_classifier = classifiers[:bitbucket]
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    @ci_classifier = classifiers[:ci]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    @task_classifier = classifiers[:task]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    @generic_classifier = classifiers[:generic]
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  # Analyzes an event and returns a classification of metrics to be created
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  #
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The event to classify
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] A hash with a :metrics key containing an array of metric definitions
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  def classify_event(event)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    event_type = event.name
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    # Dispatch to the appropriate handler based on the event type pattern
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    case event_type
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    when /^github\./
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                      delegate_to_github_classifier(event)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    when /^jira\./
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                      delegate_to_jira_classifier(event)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    when /^gitlab\./
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      delegate_to_gitlab_classifier(event)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    when /^bitbucket\./
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      delegate_to_bitbucket_classifier(event)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    when /^ci\./
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                      delegate_to_ci_classifier(event)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    when /^task\./
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      delegate_to_task_classifier(event)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    else
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      delegate_to_generic_classifier(event)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  private
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  # Delegation methods to source-specific classifiers
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  def delegate_to_github_classifier(event)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    if @github_classifier
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      @github_classifier.classify(event)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    else
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      classify_github_event(event)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  def delegate_to_jira_classifier(event)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    if @jira_classifier
          
      71.

                      @jira_classifier.classify(event)

    72. 
            

            

                    else
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      classify_jira_event(event)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77.

                  def delegate_to_generic_classifier(event)

                    if @generic_classifier

                  end
          
      116.

    117. 
            

            

                  # Fallback classification methods
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  # These methods will be overridden or replaced in the future with specific implementations
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  # Fallback method for GitHub events when no GitHub classifier is provided
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] GitHub event to classify
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] Classification result
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  def classify_github_event(event)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    # Default implementation - will be enhanced in the future
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    { metrics: [] }
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  # Fallback method for Jira events when no Jira classifier is provided
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] Jira event to classify
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] Classification result
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  def classify_jira_event(event)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    event_subtype = event.name.sub("jira.", "")
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    case event_subtype
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    when /^issue_(created|updated|resolved|deleted)$/
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      action = ::Regexp.last_match(1)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                      {
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                        metrics: [
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                          # Total issues
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                          {
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                            name: "jira.issue.total",
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_jira_dimensions(event).merge(action: action)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                          },
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                          # Issues by action type
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                          {
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                            name: "jira.issue.#{action}",
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_jira_dimensions(event)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                          },
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                          # Issues by type
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                          {
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                            name: "jira.issue.by_type",
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_jira_dimensions(event).merge(
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                              issue_type: extract_jira_issue_type(event),
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                              action: action
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                            )
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                          }
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                      }
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    when /^sprint_(started|closed)$/
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                      action = ::Regexp.last_match(1)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                      {
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                        metrics: [
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                          {
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                            name: "jira.sprint.#{action}",
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_jira_dimensions(event)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                          }
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                      }
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    else
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      # Generic Jira event
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                      {
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                        metrics: [
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                          {
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                            name: "jira.#{event_subtype}.total",
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_jira_dimensions(event)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                          }
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                      }
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  # Fallback method for GitLab events when no GitLab classifier is provided
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] GitLab event to classify
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189.

                  def classify_gitlab_event(event)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    # Default implementation - will be enhanced in the future

                  # Fallback method for Bitbucket events when no Bitbucket classifier is provided

                  def classify_bitbucket_event(event)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    event_subtype = event.name.sub("bitbucket.", "")
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    case event_subtype
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    when /^repo:push$/

                      {
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                        metrics: [
          
      205.

                          {
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                            name: "bitbucket.push.total",
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208.

      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                          },
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                          {
          
      211.

                            name: "bitbucket.push.commits",

      214.

      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                        ]
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                      }
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    when /^pullrequest:(created|approved|merged|rejected)$/
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                      action = ::Regexp.last_match(1)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                      {
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                        metrics: [
          
      221.

                          {
          
      222.

                            name: "bitbucket.pullrequest.total",
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                            value: 1,

      225.

      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                            value: 1,
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                            dimensions: extract_bitbucket_dimensions(event)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                          }
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                        ]

                  def extract_jira_dimensions(event)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                    data = event.data

      286.

                  def extract_bitbucket_dimensions(event)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                    data = event.data
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                    {
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                      repository: data.dig(:repository, :full_name) || "unknown",
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                      source: event.source
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                    }
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                  end
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

            
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                  def extract_bitbucket_commit_count(event)
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                    changes = event.data.dig(:push, :changes) || []
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                    changes.sum { |change| change.dig(:commits)&.size || 0 }
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                end
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

              end
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

            end

            module Domain

              # Event represents a domain event in the system
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              class Event
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                attr_reader :id, :name, :source, :data, :timestamp

                # Create a new Event

      11.

                # @param id [String, nil] Optional ID for the event (will be auto-generated if not provided)
          
      12.

                # @param name [String] The name/type of the event

                # @param source [String] The source system that generated the event

                def initialize(name:, source:, data:, id: nil, timestamp: Time.current)

    17. 
            

            

                  @id = id || SecureRandom.uuid

    18. 
            

            

                  @name = name

    19.

                  validate!
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25.

                # Convert the event to a hash for serialization
          
      26.

                #
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # @return [Hash] The event as a hash
          
      28.

                def to_h
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  {
          
      30.

                    id: id,

      36.

                end

                # Equality methods for testing

                def ==(other)

    40.

      48.

                alias eql? ==

                # Business logic methods

                def age

                def with_id(new_id)

    61. 
            

            

                  self.class.new(

                end
          
      69.

      70.

                private
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # Validates that the event data is well-formed
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                # @raise [ArgumentError] If any validations fail
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                def validate!
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Event name cannot be blank" if name.nil? || name.strip.empty?
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Event source cannot be blank" if source.nil? || source.strip.empty?
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Event data must be a Hash" unless data.is_a?(Hash)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Event timestamp must be a Time" unless timestamp.is_a?(Time)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

              end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            end

    app/core/domain/event_factory.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    29 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 29 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            module Domain
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # Factory class for creating Domain::Event objects with consistent parameters
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # This provides a standardized interface for event creation across the application
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              class EventFactory
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Create a new Domain::Event with standardized parameter naming
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                #
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # @param name [String] The name/type of the event (maps to event_type in database)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # @param source [String] The source system that generated the event (maps to aggregate_id in database)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # @param data [Hash] The event payload data (maps to payload in database)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # @param id [String, nil] Optional ID for the event (will be auto-generated if not provided)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                # @param timestamp [Time] When the event occurred (maps to created_at in database)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # @return [Domain::Event] A new Domain::Event instance
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                def self.create(name:, source:, data:, id: nil, timestamp: Time.current)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  Domain::Event.new(
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    name: name,
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    source: source,
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    data: data,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    id: id,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    timestamp: timestamp
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  )
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Create a Domain::Event from a DomainEvent ActiveRecord object
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # This standardizes the mapping between database columns and domain attributes
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                #
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # @param record [DomainEvent] The database record to convert
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                # @return [Domain::Event] A new Domain::Event instance
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                def self.from_record(record)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  Domain::Event.new(
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    id: record.id.to_s,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    name: record.event_type,
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    source: record.aggregate_id,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    data: record.payload,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    timestamp: record.created_at
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  )
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                # Prepare a Domain::Event for persistence to database
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                # This maps domain attributes to their database column equivalents
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                #
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # @param event [Domain::Event] The domain event to prepare for persistence
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                # @return [Hash] A hash of attributes ready for database persistence
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                def self.to_persistence_attributes(event)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  {
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                    aggregate_id: event.source,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    event_type: event.name,
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    payload: event.data
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    # id and timestamp/created_at are typically handled by the database
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  }
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            end
          
      55.

    app/core/domain/extractors/dimension_extractor.rb

    0.0% lines covered

                # DimensionExtractor is responsible for extracting dimension data from events
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # It provides methods for all supported event sources
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                class DimensionExtractor
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  # Extract appropriate dimensions for an event based on its source
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The event to extract dimensions from
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] A hash of dimension key-value pairs
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  def extract_dimensions(event)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    event_type = event.name
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    case event_type
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    when /^github\./
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      extract_github_dimensions(event)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    when /^jira\./
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      extract_jira_dimensions(event)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    when /^gitlab\./
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      extract_gitlab_dimensions(event)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    when /^bitbucket\./
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      extract_bitbucket_dimensions(event)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    when /^ci\./
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      extract_ci_dimensions(event)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    when /^task\./
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      extract_task_dimensions(event)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                      { source: event.source }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Extract GitHub event dimensions
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The GitHub event
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] GitHub-specific dimensions
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  def extract_github_dimensions(event)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    data = event.data
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    {
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      repository: data.dig(:repository, :full_name) || "unknown",
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                      organization: extract_org_from_repo(data.dig(:repository, :full_name)),
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      source: event.source
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    }
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  # Extract Jira event dimensions
          
      45.

      46.

                  # @return [Hash] Jira-specific dimensions
          
      47.

                  def extract_jira_dimensions(event)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    data = event.data
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    {
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      project: data.dig(:issue, :fields, :project, :key) ||
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                        data.dig(:project, :key) ||
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                        "unknown",
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      source: event.source
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  # Extract GitLab event dimensions

      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63.

                  # Extract CI event dimensions

                  # Extract Task event dimensions

                  def extract_task_dimensions(event)

                  # Helper method to extract the organization from a repository name
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  # @param repo_name [String] The repository name (e.g., "org/repo")
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  # @return [String] The organization name
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  def extract_org_from_repo(repo_name)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    return "unknown" unless repo_name
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    repo_name.split("/").first
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  # Helper method to extract commit count from a GitHub event
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The GitHub event
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  # @return [Integer] The number of commits
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  def extract_commit_count(event)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    event.data[:commits]&.size || 1
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  # Helper method to extract author from a GitHub event
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The GitHub event
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  # @return [String] The author name or login
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  def extract_author(event)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    event.data.dig(:sender, :login) ||
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      event.data.dig(:pusher, :name) ||
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      "unknown"
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  # Helper method to extract branch from a GitHub event
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The GitHub event
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  # @return [String] The branch name
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  def extract_branch(event)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    ref = event.data[:ref]
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    return "unknown" unless ref
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    # Remove refs/heads/ or refs/tags/ prefix
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    ref.gsub(%r{^refs/(heads|tags)/}, "")
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  # Helper method to extract Jira issue type
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The Jira event
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  # @return [String] The issue type
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  def extract_jira_issue_type(event)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    event.data.dig(:issue, :fields, :issuetype, :name) || "unknown"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  # Helper method to extract GitLab commit count
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The GitLab event
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  # @return [Integer] The number of commits
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  def extract_gitlab_commit_count(event)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    if event.data[:commits]
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                      event.data[:commits].size
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    elsif event.data[:total_commits_count]
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      event.data[:total_commits_count]
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                      1
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  # Helper method to extract Bitbucket commit count
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The Bitbucket event
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  # @return [Integer] The number of commits
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  def extract_bitbucket_commit_count(event)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    changes = event.data.dig(:push, :changes) || []
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                    changes.sum { |change| change.dig(:commits)&.size || 0 }
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  # Helper method to extract CI duration
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  # @param event [Domain::Event] The CI event
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  # @return [Integer] The duration in seconds
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  def extract_ci_duration(event)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    # Duration in seconds
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    data = event.data
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    start_time = data[:start_time]
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    end_time = data[:end_time]
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    if start_time && end_time
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                        Time.parse(end_time) - Time.parse(start_time)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                      rescue StandardError
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                        0
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                      end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    else
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                      data[:duration] || 0
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            end
          
      189.

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            module Domain

              class Metric

                def initialize(name:, value:, source:, id: nil, timestamp: Time.now, dimensions: {})
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  @id = id
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  @name = name
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  @value = value
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @timestamp = timestamp
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  @source = source
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  @dimensions = dimensions
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  validate!
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17.
