    687. 
            

            

            
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            

            

                def extract_commit_count(event)
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            

            

                  event.data[:commits]&.size || 1
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            

            

                end
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            

            

            
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            

            

                def extract_author(event)
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            

            

                  event.data.dig(:sender, :login) ||
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            

            

                    event.data.dig(:pusher, :name) ||
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            

            

                    "unknown"
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            

            

                end
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            

            

            
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            

            

                def extract_branch(event)
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            

            

                  ref = event.data[:ref]
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            

            

                  return "unknown" unless ref
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            

            

            
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            

            

                  # Remove refs/heads/ or refs/tags/ prefix
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            

            

                  ref.gsub(%r{^refs/(heads|tags)/}, "")
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            

            

                end
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            

            

            
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            

            

                def extract_jira_dimensions(event)
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            

            

                  data = event.data
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            

            

                  {
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            

            

                    project: data.dig(:issue, :fields, :project, :key) ||
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            

            

                      data.dig(:project, :key) ||
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            

            

                      "unknown",
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            

            

                    source: event.source
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            

            

                  }
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            

            

                end
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            

            

            
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            

            

                def extract_jira_issue_type(event)
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            

            

                  event.data.dig(:issue, :fields, :issuetype, :name) || "unknown"
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            

            

                end
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            

            

            
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            

            

                def extract_gitlab_dimensions(event)
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            

            

                  data = event.data
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            

            

                  {
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            

            

                    project: data.dig(:project, :path_with_namespace) || "unknown",
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724. 
            

            

                    source: event.source
          
      725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    725. 
            

            

                  }
          
      726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    726. 
            

            

                end
          
      727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    727. 
            

            

            
          
      728. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    728. 
            

            

                def extract_gitlab_commit_count(event)
          
      729. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    729. 
            

            

                  if event.data[:commits]
          
      730. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    730. 
            

            

                    event.data[:commits].size
          
      731. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    731. 
            

            

                  elsif event.data[:total_commits_count]
          
      732. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    732. 
            

            

                    event.data[:total_commits_count]
          
      733. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    733. 
            

            

                  else
          
      734. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    734. 
            

            

                    1
          
      735. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    735. 
            

            

                  end
          
      736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    736. 
            

            

                end
          
      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            

            

            
          
      738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    738. 
            

            

                def extract_bitbucket_dimensions(event)
          
      739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    739. 
            

            

                  data = event.data
          
      740. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    740. 
            

            

                  {
          
      741. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    741. 
            

            

                    repository: data.dig(:repository, :full_name) || "unknown",
          
      742. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    742. 
            

            

                    source: event.source
          
      743. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    743. 
            

            

                  }
          
      744. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    744. 
            

            

                end
          
      745. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    745. 
            

            

            
          
      746. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    746. 
            

            

                def extract_bitbucket_commit_count(event)
          
      747. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    747. 
            

            

                  changes = event.data.dig(:push, :changes) || []
          
      748. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    748. 
            

            

                  changes.sum { |change| change.dig(:commits)&.size || 0 }
          
      749. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    749. 
            

            

                end
          
      750. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    750. 
            

            

            
          
      751. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    751. 
            

            

                def extract_ci_dimensions(event)
          
      752. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    752. 
            

            

                  data = event.data
          
      753. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    753. 
            

            

                  {
          
      754. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    754. 
            

            

                    project: data[:project] || "unknown",
          
      755. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    755. 
            

            

                    provider: data[:provider] || "unknown",
          
      756. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    756. 
            

            

                    source: event.source
          
      757. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    757. 
            

            

                  }
          
      758. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    758. 
            

            

                end
          
      759. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    759. 
            

            

            
          
      760. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    760. 
            

            

                def extract_ci_duration(event)
          
      761. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    761. 
            

            

                  # Duration in seconds
          
      762. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    762. 
            

            

                  data = event.data
          
      763. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    763. 
            

            

                  start_time = data[:start_time]
          
      764. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    764. 
            

            

                  end_time = data[:end_time]
          
      765. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    765. 
            

            

            
          
      766. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    766. 
            

            

                  if start_time && end_time
          
      767. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    767. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      768. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    768. 
            

            

                      Time.parse(end_time) - Time.parse(start_time)
          
      769. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    769. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError
          
      770. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    770. 
            

            

                      0
          
      771. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    771. 
            

            

                    end
          
      772. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    772. 
            

            

                  else
          
      773. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    773. 
            

            

                    data[:duration] || 0
          
      774. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    774. 
            

            

                  end
          
      775. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    775. 
            

            

                end
          
      776. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    776. 
            

            

            
          
      777. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    777. 
            

            

                def extract_task_dimensions(event)
          
      778. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    778. 
            

            

                  data = event.data
          
      779. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    779. 
            

            

                  {
          
      780. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    780. 
            

            

                    project: data[:project] || "unknown",
          
      781. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    781. 
            

            

                    task_type: data[:type] || "unknown",
          
      782. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    782. 
            

            

                    source: event.source
          
      783. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    783. 
            

            

                  }
          
      784. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    784. 
            

            

                end
          
      785. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    785. 
            

            

              end
          
      786. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    786. 
            

            

            end
          
      787.

    app/core/domain/reflexive_agent.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    203 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 203 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            module Domain
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              class ReflexiveAgent
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                attr_reader :name, :sensors, :actuators, :rules
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Initialize the reflexive agent with name, sensors, actuators and condition-action rules
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                def initialize(name:, sensors: [], actuators: [], rules: {})
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  @name = name
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  @sensors = sensors
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  @actuators = actuators
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  @rules = {}
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  # Initialize rules if provided
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  if rules.is_a?(Hash)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    # Handle rules in hash format (condition => action)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    rules.each do |condition, action|
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      add_rule_internal(condition, action)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  elsif rules.is_a?(Array)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    # Handle rules in array format from agent.rb
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    rules.each do |rule|
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      next unless rule.is_a?(Hash) && rule[:condition] && rule[:action] && rule[:actuator_name]
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      # Convert old format to new format
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      condition = rule[:condition]
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      action = {
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                        actuator_name: rule[:actuator_name],
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                        action_name: rule[:action]
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      }
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                      add_rule_internal(condition, action)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  validate!
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # Main perception-action cycle of the reflexive agent
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                def perceive_and_act
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  # 1. Gather percepts from all sensors
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  percepts = gather_percepts
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  # 2. Process percepts according to condition-action rules
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  actions = determine_actions(percepts)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # 3. Execute determined actions
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  results = execute_actions(actions, percepts)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  # Return the results of perception and action
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  {
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    percepts: percepts,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    actions: actions,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    results: results
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # Alias for backward compatibility
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                def run_cycle
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  result = perceive_and_act
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # For backward compatibility with agent.rb, transform the results format
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  if result[:results]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    result[:results].map do |r|
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      if r[:status] == "success"
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                        condition = @rules.keys.find do |k|
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                          @rules[k] == result[:actions].find do |a|
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                            a[:action_name] == r[:action] || a[:action] == r[:action]
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                          end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                        legacy_rule = {
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                          condition: condition,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                          action: r[:action],
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                          actuator_name: r[:actuator]
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                        }
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                        {
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                          rule: legacy_rule,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                          actuator: r[:actuator],
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                          action: r[:action],
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                          success: true # Explicitly set to true for legacy compatibility
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                        }
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      else
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                        nil
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    end.compact
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    []
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # Method to handle both forms of add_rule
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                def add_rule(*args, **kwargs)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  if args.length >= 1 && kwargs.empty?
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    # Modern format: add_rule(condition, action)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    condition, action = args
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    add_rule_internal(condition, action)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  elsif args.empty? && !kwargs.empty?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    # Legacy format: add_rule(condition: proc, action: :action, actuator_name: "name")
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    condition = kwargs[:condition]
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    action = kwargs[:action]
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    actuator_name = kwargs[:actuator_name]
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    unless condition && (action || actuator_name)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Invalid rule specification. Must provide condition and action"
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    actual_action = {
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      actuator_name: actuator_name,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      action_name: action
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    }
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    result = add_rule_internal(condition, actual_action)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    # Return format expected by agent.rb
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    {
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                      condition: condition,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      action: action,
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      actuator_name: actuator_name
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    }
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  else
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError,
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                          "Invalid arguments to add_rule. Use either add_rule(condition, action) or add_rule(condition: proc, action: :action, actuator_name: 'name')"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                # Add a new sensor to the agent
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                def add_sensor(sensor)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  validate_sensor(sensor)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  @sensors << sensor
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                # Add a new actuator to the agent
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                def add_actuator(actuator)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  validate_actuator(actuator)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  @actuators << actuator
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                # Gather percepts from all sensors
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                def perceive
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  gather_percepts
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                private
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                # Internal method to add rules consistently
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                def add_rule_internal(condition, action)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  validate_rule(condition, action)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  @rules[condition] = action
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  action
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                # Validate required components of the agent
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                def validate!
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Name cannot be empty" if name.nil? || name.empty?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Sensors must be an array" unless sensors.is_a?(Array)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Actuators must be an array" unless actuators.is_a?(Array)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  # Validate each sensor and actuator
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  sensors.each { |sensor| validate_sensor(sensor) }
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  actuators.each { |actuator| validate_actuator(actuator) }
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                end
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                # Validate that a sensor responds to the perceive method
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                def validate_sensor(sensor)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  return if sensor.respond_to?(:perceive) && sensor.respond_to?(:name)
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Sensor must implement 'perceive' method and have a 'name' attribute"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                # Validate that an actuator responds to the execute method
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                def validate_actuator(actuator)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  # Support both direct type check and duck typing for flexibility
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  if (defined?(Domain::Actuator) && actuator.is_a?(Domain::Actuator)) ||
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                     (actuator.respond_to?(:execute) && actuator.respond_to?(:name) &&
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                      actuator.respond_to?(:supported_actions) && actuator.respond_to?(:supports_action?))
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    true
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  else
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Actuator must implement proper interfaces or be a Domain::Actuator"
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                # Validate that a rule's condition is callable and action is valid
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                def validate_rule(condition, action)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  unless condition.respond_to?(:call)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Rule condition must be callable (respond to 'call' method)"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  if action.is_a?(Hash)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                    # Validate structured action like in agent.rb
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                    unless action[:actuator_name] && (action[:action_name] || action[:action])
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Structured action must include :actuator_name and :action_name (or :action) keys"
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    # Normalize the action_name key
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    action[:action_name] ||= action[:action]
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

            
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    actuator = find_actuator(action[:actuator_name])
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Actuator '#{action[:actuator_name]}' not found" unless actuator
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    # Skip the supports_action? check for tests or when the actuator doesn't implement it
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    # This makes the agent more flexible in tests and when using simpler actuators
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  elsif !action.is_a?(Symbol) && !action.respond_to?(:call)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Rule action must be a symbol, hash with actuator details, or callable"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                # Find an actuator by name
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                def find_actuator(actuator_name)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  actuators.find { |a| a.name == actuator_name }
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                # Gather percepts from all sensors
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                def gather_percepts
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  sensors.each_with_object({}) do |sensor, percepts|
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    percepts[sensor.name] = sensor.perceive
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                # Determine actions based on percepts and condition-action rules
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                def determine_actions(percepts)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  actions = []
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  rules.each do |condition, action|
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    actions << action if condition.call(percepts)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                  end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  actions
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                # Execute all determined actions
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                def execute_actions(actions, percepts)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  results = []
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  actions.each do |action|
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                    result = execute_single_action(action, percepts)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                    results << result
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  results
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                # Execute a single action based on its type
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                def execute_single_action(action, percepts)
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  if action.is_a?(Symbol)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                    # Find actuator that can handle this action
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                    actuator = actuators.find { |a| a.supports_action?(action) }
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                    if actuator
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

                        result = actuator.execute(action)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                        { status: "success", actuator: actuator.name, action: action, result: result }
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                      rescue StandardError => e
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                        { status: "error", actuator: actuator.name, action: action, error: e.message }
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                      end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                    else
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                      { status: "failure", reason: "No actuator found for action '#{action}'" }
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                    end
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  elsif action.is_a?(Hash) && action[:actuator_name] && (action[:action_name] || action[:action])
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                    # Structured action from agent.rb
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                    actuator_name = action[:actuator_name]
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                    action_name = action[:action_name] || action[:action]
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                    params = action[:params] || {}
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                    actuator = find_actuator(actuator_name)
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                    return { status: "failure", reason: "Actuator '#{actuator_name}' not found" } unless actuator
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                      result = actuator.execute(action_name, **params)
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                      { status: "success", actuator: actuator_name, action: action_name, result: result }
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                      { status: "error", actuator: actuator_name, action: action_name, error: e.message }
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                    end
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  elsif action.respond_to?(:call)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                    # Execute callable action
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                      result = action.call(actuators, percepts)
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                      { status: "success", action: "callable", result: result }
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                    rescue StandardError => e
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                      { status: "error", action: "callable", error: e.message }
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                    end
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  else
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                    { status: "failure", reason: "Unknown action type: #{action.class}" }
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                  end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                end
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

              end
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

            end
          
      288.

              # Base class for all sensors that provide percepts about the environment
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              class Sensor

                attr_reader :name, :properties

                  @name = name

    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  validate!
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                end

                # Abstract method to be implemented by concrete sensors

    16. 
            

            

                # Returns the current perception of the environment
          
      17.

                def perceive

                  raise NotImplementedError, "#{self.class.name} must implement #perceive"

              # Temperature sensor that can detect ambient temperature

      37.

                def perceive

                  reading = fetch_current_temperature

                # Simulated temperature reading

                def fetch_current_temperature
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  # Simulate a temperature reading between 18 and 28 degrees
          
      60.

                  rand(18.0..28.0).round(1)
          
      61.

              # Motion sensor that can detect movement in a specific area

                def perceive

                  motion_detected = detect_motion

      77.

                    motion_detected: motion_detected,

                def validate!

                  raise ArgumentError, "Location cannot be empty" if location.nil? || location.empty?

                  valid_sensitivities = [:low, :medium, :high]

                  return if valid_sensitivities.include?(sensitivity)

                  raise ArgumentError, "Sensitivity must be one of: #{valid_sensitivities.join(', ')}"
          
      94.

                # Simulated motion detection

                # In a real application, this would connect to an actual device

                def detect_motion
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  # Simulate motion detection with a 30% chance of detecting motion
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  rand < 0.3

    101.

              # Light level sensor that can detect ambient light

              class LightSensor < Sensor
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                attr_reader :location
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                def initialize(name:, location:, **properties)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  @location = location
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  super(name: name, **properties)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                def perceive
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  light_level = measure_light_level
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  {
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    light_level: light_level, # Value between 0 and 100
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    location: location,
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    timestamp: Time.now
          
      119.

                end

                private

    124. 
            

            

                def validate!
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  super
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Location cannot be empty" if location.nil? || location.empty?
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                # Simulated light level measurement
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                # In a real application, this would connect to an actual device
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                def measure_light_level
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  # Time-of-day-based simulation (brighter during day, darker at night)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  hour = Time.now.hour
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  if (6..18).cover?(hour)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    # Daytime: 50-100 light level
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                    rand(50..100)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  else
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    # Nighttime: 0-30 light level
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    rand(0..30)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            end
          
      144.

    app/core/use_case_factory.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    75 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 75 lines missed.

            require_relative "use_cases/process_event"

    2. 
            

            

            require_relative "use_cases/calculate_metrics"
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            require_relative "use_cases/detect_anomalies"

                def create_calculate_metrics
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  # CalculateMetrics needs both repositories - it finds events but saves metrics
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  # Create a temporary composite adapter for backward compatibility
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  composite_repository = Object.new
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  # Add event repository methods
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  event_repository = DependencyContainer.resolve(:event_repository)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  metric_repository = DependencyContainer.resolve(:metric_repository)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # Define methods on our anonymous composite object
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  composite_repository.define_singleton_method(:find_event) do |id|
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                    event_repository.find_event(id)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # Add metric repository methods
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  [:save_metric, :find_metric, :find_aggregate_metric, :update_metric].each do |method|
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    composite_repository.define_singleton_method(method) do |*args|
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      metric_repository.send(method, *args)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  end
          
      41.
