            class MetricAggregationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              include Sidekiq::Job
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              sidekiq_options queue: "metric_aggregation", retry: 3
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def perform(time_period = "5min")
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Starting metric aggregation for period: #{time_period}")
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                # Get timestamp range for this aggregation period
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                end_time = Time.current
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                start_time = case time_period
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                             when "5min"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                               5.minutes.ago
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                             when "hourly"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                               1.hour.ago
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                             when "daily"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                               1.day.ago
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                             when "monthly"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                               1.month.ago
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                             when "yearly"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                               1.year.ago
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                             else
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                               5.minutes.ago
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                             end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # Process metrics in this time window
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                metrics_count = process_metrics_in_window(start_time, end_time, time_period)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Only generate DORA metrics for daily or longer periods
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                if ["daily", "monthly", "yearly"].include?(time_period)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Generating DORA metrics for period: #{time_period}")
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  dora_metrics_count = process_dora_metrics(time_period)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info("Generated #{dora_metrics_count} DORA metrics")
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Completed metric aggregation for period: #{time_period}, processed #{metrics_count} metrics")
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Error in MetricAggregationJob: #{e.message}")
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error(e.backtrace.join("\n"))
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                raise
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              private
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46.

              def process_metrics_in_window(start_time, end_time, time_period)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                metric_repository = DependencyContainer.resolve(:metric_repository)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Get metrics that need aggregation (with .total suffix)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                metrics = metric_repository.list_metrics(
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  start_time: start_time,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  end_time: end_time,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  name_pattern: "%.total"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                )
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Found #{metrics.size} metrics to aggregate for period: #{time_period}")
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                return 0 if metrics.empty?
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                # Group metrics by source and name for efficient aggregation
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                grouped_metrics = group_metrics_for_aggregation(metrics)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                # Process each group in a single transaction
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                grouped_metrics.each do |key, metrics_group|
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  update_aggregates_for_group(key, metrics_group, time_period)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                metrics.size
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              def process_dora_metrics(time_period)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                metric_repository = DependencyContainer.resolve(:metric_repository)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                # Create service instances
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                dora_service = ServiceFactory.create_dora_service
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                # Calculate different time periods to generate DORA metrics for
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # Regardless of aggregation schedule, we want metrics for standard dashboard filter periods
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                standard_periods = [7, 30, 90]
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Calculating DORA metrics for standard periods: #{standard_periods.join(', ')} days")
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                # Track how many metrics we create
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                dora_metrics_count = 0
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                # Process each standard time period
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                standard_periods.each do |days|
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88.

    89.

    90.

      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91.

      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  change_failure_rate = dora_service.change_failure_rate(days)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  # Record current timestamp for consistency across all metrics
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  timestamp = Time.current
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  time_period_str = timestamp.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  # Create a metric for deployment frequency
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  metric = Domain::Metric.new(

    100. 
            

            

                    name: "dora.deployment_frequency",
          
      101.

      103.

      111.

                    }

    112.

      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

              def group_metrics_for_aggregation(metrics)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                metrics.group_by do |metric|
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  # Group by base name (e.g., github.push from github.push.total)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  base_parts = metric.name.split(".")
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  base_name = base_parts.size >= 2 ? base_parts[0..1].join(".") : metric.name
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  # Include source and any other important dimensions in the grouping
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  [base_name, metric.source, metric.dimensions["repository"]]
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              def update_aggregates_for_group(key, metrics, time_period)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                base_name, source, repository = key
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                metric_repository = DependencyContainer.resolve(:metric_repository)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                # Calculate total for this group
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                total_value = metrics.sum(&:value)
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

            
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                # Build dimensions
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                dimensions = {
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  source: source,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  time_period: formatted_time_period(time_period)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                }
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                dimensions[:repository] = repository if repository
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                # Determine aggregate name based on time period
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                aggregate_name = "#{base_name}.#{period_suffix(time_period)}"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug { "Updating aggregate: #{aggregate_name} with value: #{total_value}" }
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                # Update or create the aggregate in a transaction
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  aggregate = metric_repository.find_aggregate_metric(aggregate_name, dimensions)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  if aggregate
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                    # Update existing aggregate
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    updated_aggregate = aggregate.with_value(total_value)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    metric_repository.update_metric(updated_aggregate)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug { "Updated existing aggregate: #{aggregate_name} (#{dimensions[:time_period]})" }
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  else
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    # Create new aggregate
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    new_aggregate = Domain::Metric.new(
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                      name: aggregate_name,
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                      value: total_value,
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                      source: source,
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                      dimensions: dimensions,
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                      timestamp: Time.current
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                    )
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    saved_aggregate = metric_repository.save_metric(new_aggregate)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug do
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      "Created new aggregate: #{aggregate_name} (#{dimensions[:time_period]}) with ID: #{saved_aggregate.id}"
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                end
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              def formatted_time_period(time_period)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                case time_period
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                when "5min"
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  # Round to nearest 5-minute interval
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  time = Time.current
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                  rounded_min = (time.min / 5) * 5
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                  time.change(min: rounded_min).strftime("%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M")
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                when "hourly"
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                  Time.current.strftime("%Y-%m-%d-%H")
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                when "daily"
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                  Time.current.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                when "monthly"
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                  Time.current.strftime("%Y-%m")
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                when "yearly"
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  Time.current.strftime("%Y")
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                else
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  Time.current.strftime("%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M")
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

                end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

              end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              def period_suffix(time_period)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                case time_period
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                when "5min" then "5min"
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                when "hourly" then "hourly"
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                when "daily" then "daily"
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                when "monthly" then "monthly"
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                when "yearly" then "yearly"
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                else "5min"
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

              end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

            end
          
      263.

    app/sidekiq/metric_calculation_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    39 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 39 lines missed.

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class MetricCalculationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              include Sidekiq::Job
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Set queue name and retry options
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              sidekiq_options queue: "metric_calculation", retry: 3
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Process metric calculations for an event
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # @param event_id [String] The ID of the event to process
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              def perform(event_id)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Quick UUID format check - just a job-level optimization
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                if uuid_format?(event_id.to_s) && !valid_event_id?(event_id)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.error("Skipping job for non-existent UUID: #{event_id}")
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  return
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # Process event through the calculation use case
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                metric = process_event(event_id)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                return unless metric
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                # Add delay to ensure data consistency across database nodes
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                ensure_data_consistency
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Only log and re-raise to maintain Sidekiq retry behavior
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Error in MetricCalculationJob: #{e.message}")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                raise
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              private
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              def process_event(event_id)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                UseCaseFactory.create_calculate_metrics.call(event_id)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              rescue NoMethodError => e
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # This should only happen if the event doesn't exist, which
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # should be handled by the use case itself
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Calculate Metrics  failed: #{e.message}")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                nil
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              def ensure_data_consistency
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                # Simple delay to allow database consistency
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                sleep(0.5)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              def process_anomaly_detection(metric)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                # The use case should handle all validations internally
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                UseCaseFactory.create_detect_anomalies.call(metric.id)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Don't fail the job if anomaly detection fails
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Anomaly detection failed: #{e.message}")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                nil
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # Utility methods
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              def uuid_format?(str)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                uuid_regex = /^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$/i
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                uuid_regex.match?(str)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              def valid_event_id?(event_id)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                # Check event existence directly using the event repository
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                DependencyContainer.resolve(:event_repository).find_event(event_id).present?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            end
          
      67.

    app/sidekiq/notification_job.rb

            class NotificationJob

    4. 
            

            

              include Sidekiq::Job

              # Set queue name

              sidekiq_options queue: "notifications", retry: 3
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def perform(alert_id)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                # Send notification for an alert
          
      11.

    app/sidekiq/raw_event_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    50 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 50 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2.

      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            class RawEventJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              include Sidekiq::Job
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # Set queue name
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              sidekiq_options queue: "raw_events", retry: 3
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Process a single raw event
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # @param payload_wrapper [Hash] The raw event payload wrapper containing the event data
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              def perform(payload_wrapper)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Convert string keys to symbols (Sidekiq serializes to JSON with string keys)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                payload_wrapper = payload_wrapper.transform_keys(&:to_sym) if payload_wrapper.keys.first.is_a?(String)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # Log the raw event for debugging
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug { "Processing raw event: #{payload_wrapper[:id]}" }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # If this is a GitHub event, check for or infer the event type
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                if payload_wrapper[:source] == "github"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  # For GitHub events, we should try to determine the event type if not provided
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  event_type = infer_github_event_type(payload_wrapper[:payload])
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  if event_type
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info("Inferred GitHub event_type: #{event_type}")
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    # Store in thread local for the web adapter to access
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    Thread.current[:http_headers] = { "X-GitHub-Event" => event_type }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                # Get the process_event use case to handle this event
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                use_case = UseCaseFactory.create_process_event
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Call the use case with the raw payload and source
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                use_case.call(payload_wrapper[:payload], source: payload_wrapper[:source])
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Log success
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info("Processed raw event (id: #{payload_wrapper[:id]})")
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # Log errors
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Error processing raw event #{payload_wrapper[:id]}: #{e.message}")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error(e.backtrace.join("\n"))
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                # Sidekiq will automatically retry based on our sidekiq_options
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # After max retries, it will go to the Dead Job Queue
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                raise
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              ensure
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # Always clear thread-local storage
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                Thread.current[:http_headers] = nil
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              private
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              # Try to infer the GitHub event type from the payload
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              # This helps when X-GitHub-Event header is not available
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              def infer_github_event_type(payload)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                payload = JSON.parse(payload, symbolize_names: true) if payload.is_a?(String)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # Look for patterns in the payload to determine event type
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                if payload[:ref_type] && payload[:ref] && !payload.key?(:commits)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  return "create"  # Branch or tag creation
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:ref] && payload[:commits]
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  return "push"    # Push event
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:pull_request]
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  return "pull_request"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:issue] && !payload[:pull_request]
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  return "issues"
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:check_run]
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  return "check_run"
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:check_suite]
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  return "check_suite"
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:workflow_run]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  return "workflow_run"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:workflow_job]
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  return "workflow_job"
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:deployment] && !payload[:deployment_status]
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  return "deployment"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                elsif payload[:deployment_status]
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  return "deployment_status"
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                nil # Couldn't determine
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            end
          
      83.
